CustomField.formula: IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "MPW",'Please choose for the selected Interconnect Switch above if you need simplex deployment with one switch/router or redundant deployment with two.','An error will occur if this step is not completed. Please select up to 2 MDAs for each IOM selected.')
CustomField.label: Guidance
